professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server administrator with expertise in performance tuning, maintenance, disaster recovery, and high-availability solutions. Proficient in ETL processes, data analytics, and database optimization.

key_responsibilities: Designing and implementing high-availability solutions using AlwaysOn
Optimizing database performance through regular maintenance and tuning.
Implementing and managing disaster recovery strategies for mission-critical systems.
Managing server security and maintaining database roles.
Implementing disaster prevention and recovery strategies.
Ensuring high availability through clustering and replication.
